documentation.text: @dev Flag that represents initialization of vault
@dev An event thats emitted when Pxa tokens are released.

@dev Initilizes the proxima vault. Can be called only once.
 @param _pxa Proxima Token
@dev Flag that represents initialization of vault
@dev An event thats emitted when Pxa tokens are released.

@dev Initilizes the proxima vault. Can be called only once.
 @param _pxa Proxima Token

PublicReleaseNotification(address,uint25.details: An event thats emitted when Pxa tokens are released.

initVault(address).details: Initilizes the proxima vault. Can be called only once.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

release(address,uint256,bytes32).details: Releases Proxima token to specified destination.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

initialized.details: Flag that represents initialization of vault
